oai_dc:dc.dc:title: John F. Kennedy in Memphis
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: elections; Ellington, Buford; Gore, Albert, Sr.; Kennedy, John F.; Loeb, Henry; Shriver, Eunice Kennedy; politics; 1960s;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Caption reads: John Fitzgerald Kennedy -- 1959 Presedential [sic] Campaign -- Memphis, Tennessee --Photograph by Chris Fleming and Steve Cohen -- Back Seat: Governor Buford Ellington, John F. Kennedy, Jr. and Albert Gore, Sr. -- Front Seat: Mayor Henry Loeb, Eunice Kennedy Shriver and driver.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Fleming, Chris
